data.text: Yahweh says to his anointed, to Cyrus, whose right hand I have held to subdue nations before him and strip kings of their armor, to open the doors before him, and the gates shall not be shut:
“I will go before you
I will give you the treasures of darkness
For Jacob my servant’s sake,
I am Yahweh, and there is no one else.
that they may know from the rising of the sun,
I form the light
Rain, you heavens, from above,
Woe to him who strives with his Maker—
Woe to him who says to a father, ‘What have you become the father of?’
Yahweh, the Holy One of Israel
I have made the earth, and created man on it.
I have raised him up in righteousness,
Yahweh says: “The labor of Egypt,
Most certainly you are a God who has hidden yourself,
They will be disappointed,
Israel will be saved by Yahweh with an everlasting salvation.
For Yahweh who created the heavens,
I have not spoken in secret,
“Assemble yourselves and come.
Declare and present it.
“Look to me, and be saved, all the ends of the earth;
I have sworn by myself.
They will say of me,
All the offspring of Israel will be justified in Yahweh,
